::Demise/EndBringer/Scyther::

Demise growls as Rampage leaps on top of him. He listens to the bot's 
words, his arm reaching behind him.

Demise roars in pain as the missile explodes, making his body jerk as 
well as destroying all the armor aroudn the spot where it hit, along 
with a good portion of the circuits. Demise grabs Rampage and flings 
him off.

Trying to get to his feet, Demise realises that connections to his 
left leg were non-existant. He growls again, beginning to roll toward 
the edge of the mountain that they had come up.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer jumps over Tankorr's dive, kicking out his legs at the 
Vehicon's head. EndBringer didn't fire any more missiles; he didn't 
like being in the explosion range of his own weapons.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther jumps into the air, transforming and modifying his robot mode 
to include a jetpack. He powers it up, shots hitting his legs.

Scyther flies through the air, fireballs from inferno and an icebeam 
from someone overhead hitting each other, sending waters showering 
down on Paralysis. Scyther arms his charge launcher and fires 
downward several times.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Rampage leaps on top of Demise, the fallen bot had just skid 
across 
> the tundra from several of his shots. "Ah, I want to savor your 
fear...breath 
> it in..." He says, and inhales deeply, seeming to get enjoyment out 
of the 
> bots temporary pain. Rampage turns to his arm, once bloddy and 
bleeding, it 
> is now frozen. At least he didnt have to worry about bleeding to 
death, the 
> ice clot saved him from that.
>        "And now, its time to end this playing." He said gruffly, 
raised his 
> missle launcher, and fired point blank.
> 
>        Tankkor flipped three times, as far as he can remember. His 
right 
> crawler was damaged so he transformed and turned once agian to 
Endbringer. 
> More mech oozed its way out of his wounds and left silver puddles 
in the snow.
>        No more marching, now he was going to get this bot. With a 
sting in 
> his knee, he ran as fast as his large body could go and dove at 
Endbringer, 
> vast arms extended to keep the bot at bay.
> 
>        Paralysis hears a thud. It must be Scather falling, finally. 
He points 
> his wrist at a dent in the snow, and fires. THe black liquid was 
supposed to 
> be his paralizing toxin, but due to the cold it's chemical compound 
wasnt 
> going to be very effective. But, it would allow Paralysis to see 
the bot.
>        As the liquid spry settled on the ground, he saw the faint 
outline of 
> Scather lying on the snow.
>        "Looks like we've evened the odds a bit!" Paralysis say, and 
with a 
> left broken arm moves forward, now with pistol in hand, and begins 
a shoot 
> out.
>        Inferno buzzes around the air, sees now Scather who was once 
very 
> invisable. "Ah ha! The invader!" He soars down and releases 
fireball after 
> fireball.
